name: conchord-ui
description: A UI for the conchord file format

scripts.build: pulp browserify > app.js && pulp build -m ServerMain -o server-output --src-path server
scripts.dev-server: pulp -w --then "node server" build -m ServerMain -o server-output --src-path server
scripts.release: pulp browserify > dist && git add dist && git commit -m'release' && git push heroku master -f && git reset --hard HEAD~

author: Yannick Dominguez
